title: In 'Perfect Dictatorship,' Mexican Viewers May Struggle To Decipher Fact From Fiction
teaser: A new film in Mexico opens this week about corruption and collusion with drug traffickers in Mexican politics. In 'The Perfect Dictatorship,' the plot of political corruption and media collusion is close to reality.
